name: Ch.12ABaseConvo4
_source: speak;Dozla;GWAH HA HA!|A fine evening to you, gentlemen!|Nothing better than sharing a tankard after a hard day's battle!
speak;Garcia;Couldn't agree more, Dozla.|The young ones may have their energy, but they don't understand the simple pleasure of good company.
speak;Moulder;Indeed.|I must say, Garcia, your beard is looking particularly distinguished today.
speak;Garcia;Ha! Thank you, Father Moulder.|I've been maintaining it with a bit more care lately.|My son Ross keeps telling me I should shave it off.
speak;Dozla;WHAT?|Shave it off?|Why would the lad suggest such a terrible thing?
speak;Garcia;Says it makes me look "too old."|The boy doesn't understand that a warrior's beard is his pride!
speak;Moulder;The younger generation simply lacks appreciation for tradition.|Prince Ephraim once suggested I might look "more approachable" without my mustache.
speak;Dozla;GWAH HA HA!|Imagine Father Moulder without his magnificent mustache!|Why, you'd look like a fresh-faced acolyte!
speak;Moulder;Precisely my thought.|This mustache has guided many a troubled soul through difficult times.
speak;Garcia;It carries the wisdom of your counsel, Father Moulder.|Just as my beard carries the experience of many battles.
speak;Dozla;And my grand beard and mustache combo carries the ADVENTURE of a lifetime with Lady L'Arachel!|GWAH HA HA!
speak;Garcia;You know, Princess Tana actually asked me once if my beard gets in the way during combat.
speak;Garcia;I told her that my beard intimidates my enemies!|They see it and know they face a seasoned warrior!
speak;Dozla;EXACTLY!|Lady L'Arachel says my beard makes me look FEROCIOUS!|The perfect guardian for a noble on a sacred mission!
speak;Moulder;Lady Natasha once kindly offered to trim my mustache when it was singed after a battle.|I politely declined, of course.
speak;Garcia;Of course!|Battle damage only adds character!
speak;Seth;Pardon the interruption, gentlemen.|The war council will begin shortly.
speak;Moulder;Thank you, General Seth.|We'll be there momentarily.
speak;Seth;If I might ask...|What has you all in such good spirits?
speak;Dozla;We were discussing the MAGNIFICENT art of facial hair!|Something you might consider, young Seth!
speak;Seth;Me?|I'm afraid a full beard might be impractical for someone in my position.
speak;Seth;Perhaps when the war is over, I might consider it.|Good day, gentlemen.
speak;Moulder;You know, I believe we've touched on something profound here.|Our beards and mustaches are more than just hair.
speak;Dozla;They're symbols of our EXPERIENCE!|Of WISDOM!|Of ADVENTURE!
speak;Garcia;To facial hair, my friends!|May the younger generation one day understand its glory!
speak;Dozla;GWAH HA HA HA!|TO FACIAL HAIR AND GLORY!
speak;Garcia;Hahaha!|Couldn't have said it better myself!
